data.title: Ellis County, TX Official Website
data.text:
Current Road Closures due to High Water or Construction as of August 22, 2024, at 8:00 AM.

If you know of roads that have High Water over it and there are no barriers across the road, please notify the Sheriff’s Office or Emergency Management Office or your Road and Bridge Precinct Office. Do not attempt to cross a road that has high water over it. STAY SAFE! DON’T DROWN, TURN AROUND!

PRECINCT 1:

Ellis County Precinct 1 will have scheduled construction work, for Bridge repairs on Novy Road. We will close the road after address 255 Novy on the south side coming from Hwy 34 entrance, and close the road on the North side of the bridge after address 440 Novy. Effective starting Monday August 26,2024-until further notice. Residents at 255-101 Novy Road need to detour using hwy 34 only, and residents at 440 -1218 Novy need to detour using hwy 660 only. This segment of road will be temporarily closed to all thru traffic at the bridges please adjust your routes accordingly.

Safety is our First Priority. Please help us provide the safest possible work zones for you and our road crew by limiting travel on this road during construction.

If you have any questions or concerns, do not hesitate to call the office.

PRECINCT 2:

Isom and Mach Rd are closed until further notice

PRECINCT 3:

No road closures at this time.

PRECINCT 4:

No road closures at this time.

City Streets:

No road closures at this time.

TXDOT:

No road closures at this time.
